DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to demonstrate equivalence of three commercial IC51 batches in terms of geometric mean titers for anti-JEV neutralizing antibody
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Three Commercial Batches of the Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine IC51
DOC.criteria: Main Male and female healthy adults aged at least 18 years, with written informed consent and either no childbearing potential or negative pregnancy test Main History of immunodeficiency or immunosuppressive therapy, Known Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV); OR Drug addiction including alcohol dependence
